description: Immediately starts a scan of the policies applied to the specified resource.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer to use to scan the policies applied to the specified resource. The ARN of the analyzer to use to scan the policies applied to the specified resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to scan. The ARN of the resource to scan.

parameters.name: resourceOwnerAccount
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource. For most Amazon Web Services resources, the owning account is the account in which the resource was created.
